name: La Guillotine
description: Roofs are fragile. At each brick, many families. Blood and books were ignored. They dropped the blade, are we going to choose the right head? The guillotine was used with the state and by the state. BrazilRoofs are fragile. At each brick, many families. Blood and books were ignored. They dropped the blade, are we going to choose the right head ? The guillotine was used with the state and by the state. Brazil is experiencing one of the worst moments in history. Neo-fascism kills every day. It's a seesaw, and people are grounded ------ Os telhados são frágeis. A cada tijolo, muitas familias. O sangue e até os livros foram ignorados. Soltaram a lâmina, será que vamos escolher a cabeça certa? A guilhotina era usada com o estado e pelo estado. O Brasil vive um dos piores momentos da história. O neofascismo mata todo dia. É uma gangorra, e povo tá de castigo.
